name: Wizards Castle
overview: Wizards Castle is 2D action game. The player controls a guy, who must go into a wizard's castle. He has 20 lives, and he loses one life with any contact with the enemy - game has several types of enemies, like birds, bugs or slugs. He can kill enemies, by punching them. The hero can collect a various crystal for points. The game has a time limit for each screen. If the time reaches 0, game over.
